venues.name: The Spa at Mandarin Oriental
venues.review: The best hotel spa in DC by a clear margin. Oriental-inspired thermal circuit with heated marble loungers, vitality pool, and sauna. The kind of place where K Street attorneys decompress before flying back to their districts. Impeccable service.

venues.name: Salt & Juniper
venues.review: A neighborhood wellness studio on 14th Street doing salt therapy, infrared sauna, and IV drips for the Shaw crowd. Small, well-curated, and genuinely useful for the urban body under chronic stress.
